The blocks are initially at rest on a frictionless horizontal surface and are made of steel and wood respectively. One bullet bounces back elastically off the steel block. The other bullet gets embedded in the wooden block. Each block moves in the same direction after the collision. The arrows in the picture below only represent the direction of the motion.
